discussion.content:
Dynamic Sales Insights
Dynamic Sales
Dynamic Sales

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
Match each product to its feature.
Instructions: To answer, drag the appropriate product from the column on the left to its feature on the right. Each product may be used once, more than once, or not at all.
NOTE: Each correct match is worth one point.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

HOTSPOT
-

A company is using Dynamics 365 Customer Insights - Journeys to collect customer contact information.

The company plans to send marketing emails to customers who have similar characteristics.

You need to configure a group of contacts based on common characteristics.

Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
Salesperson: Prioritizes Deals
Sales Manager: Provides Guidance
Sales Enablement Manager: Plans Execution Strategies

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

You plan to use sales forecasts in Dynamics 365 Sales.

You need to explain how forecasts can benefit the salesperson, their manager, and the sales enablement manager.

Which forecasting benefits should you explain? To answer, move the appropriate forecasting benefits to the correct sales role. You may use each forecasting benefit once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to move the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

HOTSPOT
-

A company uses Dynamics 365 Omnichannel for Customer Service.

Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.

//IMG//

A company plans to use Dynamics 365 Sales.

The company requires every AI feature related to sales be available.

You need to determine which solution to use.

Which solution should you identify?

discussion.content: Sales Premium is the correct answer.

Selected Answer: C
Since the question is "every AI feature" I choose Dyn 365 Sales Enterprise. 

Sales Premium also includes many AI-driven features, such as Predictive Lead Scoring, which could be beneficial in this scenario, but Sales Enterprise would cover all AI features that are related to sales, whereas Sales Premium might have some limitations depending on the specific use case.

Selected Answer: B
It is Sales premium
